name: Broiled Red Snapper With Mint
keywords: main course, mint, red snapper fillets, summer
recipeIngredient: 4 red snapper fillets, about 8 ounces each

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the broiler. Pour the marinade into a large, shallow baking dish. Put the snapper in the pan and lay 4 mint leaves over each fillet.
Broil until the snapper is just cooked through, about 8 minutes. Transfer the fillets to 4 plates and spoon the marinade over the top. Serve immediately.
